General.Name: HCL Infosystems Limited
General.Description: HCL Infosystems Limited distributes technology, mobility, and consumer products primarily in India. It operates through three segments: Hardware Products and Solutions, Learning, and Distribution. The Hardware Products and Solutions segment engages in the annual maintenance contracts (AMC) and supporting system integration projects. The Learning segment sells digitized educational content and learning solutions. The Distribution segment consists of AMC related to enterprise distribution customers. HCL Infosystems Limited was founded in 1976 and is based in Noida, India.

5.Name: Mr. Ravi  Thumboochetty
5.Title: Chief Operating Officer of International Operations
